entry.title: RiseSleep REM High Profile Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: RiseSleep Accessories
Type: Pillow
Price: 159.99

FILL - ALIGN PERFORMANCE FILL is a hypo-allergenic, breathable fill that is designed to support your neck and head while you sleep.

PAIN RELIEVING - Latex foam cushions and supports your neck while you sleep without loosing its loft.

HYPO-ALLERGENIC AND LOW MAINTENANCE - Latex is naturally anti-microbial.

ECO-FRIENDLY - Refined from the sap of the rubber tree

ICESILK COVER - Advanced cooling fibres are woven througout the quilt to help keep you cool while you sleep.

VENTILATION - Rem Pillows are designed with an air vent that will carry warm air away from your head.

entry.title: RiseSleep - Premium Weighted Blanket - 74" X 42"
entry.summary:
Vendor: RiseSleep Accessories
Type: Bedding
Price: 189.99 - 199.99 (2 variants)

 7-Layer Design

A weighted blanket worth bragging about has carefully distributed weight and keeps quiet when moved around. The Rise Weighted blanket has small glass beads sewn between two layers of poly-fill batting to keep the blanket quiet as a mouse.

Superior air flow

Where other weighted blankets have a hot Mink cover, Rise’s weighted blanket has a breathable cotton cover helps circulate air away from your body, keeping you comfortably cool.

Removeable Cover

Removable washable cover with 8 internal loops so the cover and weighted insert doesn’t shift or bunch.

entry.title: Level 3.0 Performance Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: BedGear
Type: Pillow
Price: 159.99

Features:
• Dri-Tec moisture wicking cover keeps you dry and comfortable while you sleep. Eco-friendly fibers have been
added for an extra soft touch and greater comfort.
• Patented Air-X® ventilated side panels enhance air flow throughout the pillow, moving excess heat away from
your head, neck and shoulders.
• Filter fabric behind the Air-X® panels helps prevent allergens and dander from entering the pillow core.
• Our unique ergo-molding React blend core is a combination of foam cubes and silk- feel fibers to create
support for your head, neck, and shoulders that conforms without push back, eliminate pillow bounce to improve your sleep.
• Personal Performance Size: 20"h x 26"w

entry.title: Gemini 3.0 Performance Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: BedGear
Type: Pillow
Price: 199.99

Features:
• Dri-Tec moisture wicking fabric surface helps you sleep dry and comfortable throughout the night.
• Revolutionary Ver-Tex® cool touch fabric moves away excess heat, helping you to maintain your ideal
sleep temperature throughout the night.
• Patented Air-X® ventilated panels enhance air flow throughout the pillow, moving away excess heat
from your head, neck and shoulders.
• Filter fabric behind the Air-X panels prevents allergens and dander from entering the pillow core.
• Blended Boost® foam structure provides dynamic, smooth motion performance that eliminates pillow bounce
and helps ensure deep sleep.
• Zip-off cover is machine washable in cold water, gentle cycle.
• Personal Performance Size: 20"h x 26"w

entry.title: Hyper-Cotton Performance Sheets
entry.summary:
Vendor: BedGear
Type: Bedding
Price: 139.00 - 199.00 (6 variants)

Features: 

  • Hyper-Cotton sheets have a quick dry technology that provides fast evaporation of moisture. 
  • Hyper-Cotton sheets allow 4x the air flow to your bed compared to traditional 100% cotton sheets, allowing your body to achieve optimal temperature regulation. 
  • Our fitted sheet Powerband ensures the most secure fit and grip on your mattress and works great with adjustable bases. 
  • New Luxe Powerband pillowcase ensures a snug fit with your pillow. 
  • Seamless fitted sheet creates a smooth sleep surface and longer lasting construction with no risk of ripping seams. 
  • Easy care, machine wash and dry. 
  • Ideal for all seasons. 
  • Colors: White, Champagne, Grey, Navy
  • Fits mattresses up to 18 in.

entry.title: Dri-Tec Performance Sheets
entry.summary:
Vendor: BedGear
Type: Bedding
Price: 139.00 - 199.00 (7 variants)

Features: 

  • Dri-Tec sheets allow 10x the air flow to your bed compared to traditional 100% cotton sheets, allowing your body to achieve optimal temperature regulation. 
  • Our fitted sheet Powerband ensures the most secure fit and grip on your mattress and works great with adjustable bases. 
  • New Luxe Powerband pillowcase ensures a snug fit with your pillow. 
  • The soft, conforming material moves with you throughout the night and provides a no-cling, no-pull stretch. 
  • Seamless fitted sheet creates a smooth sleep surface and grips the mattress with greater flex and recovery. 
  • Easy care, machine wash and dry. 
  • Ideal for all seasons. 
  • Colors: White, Champagne and Grey
  • Fits mattresses up to 18".

2-IN-1 Sleep Experience
Supportive memory foam joins forces with our plush SmartFiber down-alternative fill to create incomparable comfort

Innovative hypoallergenic fiberfill feels like down and continuously adapts for supple support

Breathable Design

Premium Memory Foam
Built with responsive memory foam that conforms to your body for ultimate comfort and support
Removable Washable Cover
Included cover is designed for easy care
Queen Size Only
5 Year Warranty

entry.title: TEMPUR-Neck™ Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tempur-Pedic
Type: Pillow
Price: 115.00 - 165.00 (3 variants)

The TEMPUR-Neck™ Pillow is for sleepers who want a more controlled sleep
posture to address neck or back pain. The contoured design helps align your
head, neck and shoulders for more relaxing and restful sleep.

Solid shape design

Ergonomic shape developed by doctors to promote proper alignment and support.
• Formed from a single piece of TEMPUR® material
• Allows neck and shoulder muscles to relax completely

Sleep on TEMPUR®

TEMPUR® material adapts to your unique shape.
• The support and conforming comfort that only the TEMPUR® material can deliver

Removable, Washable Cover

• 75% cotton, 25% polyester
• Dust mite and allergen-resistant

Dependable Durability

• Holds its shape, without flattening out, for years of use
• 3-Year Limited Warranty

Recommended for Back Sleepers 

Available Sizes cm
Small - 50 x 31 x 8
Medium - 50 x 31 x 10
Large - 51 x 31 x 11
